description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Dysu4F8licjEb2FY]{Vanguard Discipline}

When you use Engineering or Mysticism to disable a device, you can do so in half the normal amount of time (with 1 round becoming 1 standard action). You gain a bonus to Engineering and Mysticism checks to disable a device equal to any attack roll bonuses you have that specifically apply to resolving disarm combat maneuvers. You must have @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.0Pq35gvSI2JlD682]{Improved Combat Maneuver (Combat)} (disarm) to select this vanguard discipline.

modifiers.name: Intuitive Deconstruction - Engineering
modifiers.notes: You gain a bonus to Engineering checks to disable a device equal to any attack roll bonuses you have that specifically apply to resolving disarm combat maneuvers.

modifiers.name: Intuitive Deconstruction - Mysticism
modifiers.notes: You gain a bonus to Mysticism checks to disable a device equal to any attack roll bonuses you have that specifically apply to resolving disarm combat maneuvers.
